titleStmt.title: A true report and description of the taking of the iland and towne of S. Maries by a shippe of Amsterdam, and foure English pinnasses. 1599. Translated out of Dutch into English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [J. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe,

notesStmt.note: A translation from the original Dutch.
At end: "Pervsed by me Garret Iohnson Cater.".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
